welcome: Hello! I'm CHRONEXA_BOT, your time attendance assistant. How can I help you today?
availableActions: Here are the actions I can help you with:

actions.applyPermissionDesc: Request permission for late arrival, early departure, or missing hours
actions.applyLeaveDesc: Submit leave application for absences or extended time off
actions.manualPunchDesc: Request manual punch for missed clock in/out
actions.workSummaryDesc: View your worked hours summary for the current month
actions.pendingApprovalsDesc: Review and approve/reject team member requests

responses.permission: I can help you apply for permission. This is typically needed when you're late, leaving early, or have missing hours.
responses.leave: I'll help you apply for leave. This is required when you're absent for more than 4 hours or on a scheduled day.
responses.punch: I can assist you with requesting a manual punch. This is needed when you've missed clocking in or out.
responses.summary: I can show you your work hours summary for the current month including total hours worked and attendance records.
responses.default: I'm here to help with your time attendance needs. You can ask me about applying for permission, leave, manual punch, or viewing your work summary.
responses.processing: I'm processing your request. This feature will be available soon.
